task.title: Blueberry Oatmeal Waffles for Armando
task.shortdesc: For this recipe, Armando will need the following: 1

taskbody.context: 1 cup white whole flower, wheat flour, 1 tablespoon baking posder, ½ tablespoon salt, ¼ teaspoon ground allspice, 1 cup cooking oats, 1/3 cup unsweetened applesauce, 1 ½ cups almond milk, 3 tablespoons pur maple syrup, 2 tablespoons canola oil, 1 teaspoon pure vanilla extract, 1 ½ cups frozen blueberries.

step.cmd: combine flour, baking powder, salt and allspice into a mixing bowl. Mix in the oats. Make a well in the center and add the applesauce, milk, maple syrup, oil and vanilla. Stir until smooth.
Let sit for 5 minutes or so, then add the frozen blueberries.
Cook in the waffle iron until golden brown. Remember to spray waffle iron with cooking spray before use.
